name: Associazione Italiana Celiachia
memberOrga: The Italian Association promotes the 20 regional associations working on the land with volounteers
goal: Associazione Italiana Celiachia is the leading charity working for people with coeliac disease  and dermatitis herpetiformis. Our goal is to improve the lives of people with coeliac disease through support, campaigning and research.
euInitiatives: The italian association is submitted to the EU legislation
